summary: A collection of Elven followers. This mod is a complete standalone.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=6][b][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Been messing around with a follower mod set that I created for myself and then someone requested that she
be available. Hence I started to make things more detailed and stuff. The group is comprised of three (3) elves:
Liluth (High Elf), Una (Wood Elf), and Nephith (Dark Elf). Still on Version 1.

I still have no solid background for them. For now, they're a group of friends who once lived in Cyrodiil. Liluth's
parents left the Summerset Isles with their young daughter, Liluth, in Cyrodiil to build a future. However, during
the invasion of the Aldmeri Dominion, the three friends were able to scuttle from the city as instructed by Liluth's
mother (letter in Liluth's possession when she was told to run) and make their way into Skyrim to start all over.

Still working on the rest. All files are in BSA format and marked SFW.

Liluth can be found in Riften. Her activities differ and she doesn't stay in one spot with the exception that she
sleeps just underneath the stairs that leads to the basement of The Temple of Mara.

Nephith works at the mine of Darkwater Crossing (and sleeps in mine too). But every once in a while, she steps
outside for a breath of fresh air.

Una is part of The Hall of the Vigilant and is assigned to patrol around Solitude. She sleeps in the Temple of the Divines.[/size][/center][center]﻿
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87270/87270-1526292787-969499705.jpeg[/img]﻿[/center][center]﻿[b]LILUTH

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87270/87270-1526292817-919673259.jpeg[/img]﻿[/b][/center][center][b]﻿NEPHITH

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/87270/87270-1526292771-333710228.jpeg[/img]﻿[/b][/center][center]﻿[b]UNA

[color=#ff0000][size=6][b]HAPPY ADVENTURING!

[/b][/size][/color]PS. Working on SSE version. ;)[/center]
